title: Drawing, Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Game Room and Bar, 1935
title_raw: Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Game Room and Bar
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: GAMEROOM [sic] AND BAR FOR MR JASCHA HEIFETZ; at lower right: SCALE 1/2" = 1'; inscribed in graphite at upper margin on verso: Heifetz Bar [underlined]; at upper right: HEIFETZ
description:
Floor plan and elevations for Jascha Heifetz game room and bar. On left wall of game room is a descending, semi-circular staircase. On same wall is three-seated sofa, side table at left, and coffee table in front of sofa. Stair rail behind sofa. On far wall at right is four-seated sofa with rounded end table at left. On right wall is mantel fronted by coffee table. A chair is positioned in corner of right wall. In lower right corner of game room is a chair and round table. Window on far wall at left near staircase. Game room opens into bar. Double-doored entrance to bar on left wall. Window to the left of the door, above radiator. A single door is positioned at the left near wall. A rounded bar is positioned in lower right corner of room, with five stools or chairs arranged around countertop. Behind the bar are shelves and additional countertops. In lower left corner of room is square card(?) table with four chairs at each side.




Scale: 1/2"=1'0

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Jascha Heifetz Apartment: Game Room and Bar, 1935. Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. 
Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-255
